title: Preparation of isotopically pure superfluid 4He suitable for constructing a high density neutron source.
abstract: We have developed an isotopic purification technique by which the 4He/3He ratio may be raised beyond 2 x lO^15. This purity is sufficient for an experimental realisation of the neutron bottle recently proposed by Golub and Pend1ebury

        Preparation of isotopically pure superfluid 4He suitable for constructing a high density neutron source.</dc:title><dc:creator>

        QC Physics</dc:subject><dc:description>
